Uses of Class
xxl.core.util.ArrayResizer

  • Packages that use ArrayResizer 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.collections.bags
    Contains some bags.
    xxl.core.collections.queues
    The package xxl.core.collections.queues provides miscellaneous implementations of the queue datastructure.
    xxl.core.util
    This package provides miscellaneous utility classes that don't belong strictly to an other xxl-package.

    • Uses of ArrayResizer in xxl.core.collections.bags

      Fields in xxl.core.collections.bags declared as ArrayResizer 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ArrayResizer DynamicArrayBag.resizer
      An ArrayResizer managing the growth policy for internally used array.
      Constructors in xxl.core.collections.bags with parameters of type ArrayResizer 
      Constructor and Description
      DynamicArrayBag(int size, Object[] array, ArrayResizer resizer)
      Constructs a bag containing the elements of the specified array with a growth polity that depends on the specified array resizer.
      DynamicArrayBag(Object[] array, ArrayResizer resizer)
      Constructs a bag containing the elements of the specified array with a growth polity that depends on the specified array resizer.

    • Uses of ArrayResizer in xxl.core.collections.queues

      Fields in xxl.core.collections.queues declared as ArrayResizer 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ArrayResizer DynamicHeap.resizer
      An ArrayResizer managing the growth policy for internally used array.
      protected ArrayResizer ArrayQueue.resizer
      An ArrayResizer managing the growth policy for the internally used array.
      Constructors in xxl.core.collections.queues with parameters of type ArrayResizer 
      Constructor and Description
      DynamicHeap(Comparator<? super E> comparator, ArrayResizer resizer)
      Constructs an empty dynamic heap and uses the specified comparator to order elements when inserted.
      DynamicHeap(E[] array, Comparator<? super E> comparator, ArrayResizer resizer)
      Constructs a dynamic heap containing the elements of the specified array that returns them according to the order induced by the specified comparator.
      DynamicHeap(E[] array, int size, Comparator<? super E> comparator, ArrayResizer resizer)
      Constructs a dynamic heap containing the elements of the specified array that returns them according to the order induced by the specified comparator.

      Fields in xxl.core.util declared as ArrayResizer 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ArrayResizer ArrayResizer.DEFAULT_INSTANCE
      This instance can be used for getting a default instance of ArrayResizer.
